trans-unit.source: Provides common designer loader functionality that can be used to implement custom workflow designer loaders.
trans-unit.target: Fornece a funcionalidade de carregador de designer comum que pode ser usada para implementar carregadores de designer de fluxo de trabalho personalizados.

trans-unit.source: Designer loader classes are used to load the designer and save any changes to the state of the designer when the user so instructs.
trans-unit.target: O carregador de designer classes é usado para carregar o designer e salvar as alterações para o estado do designer, quando então instrui o usuário.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> class can be implemented to support custom loading of a workflow designer and workflow designer components.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> classe pode ser implementada para dar suporte a carregamento personalizado de um designer de fluxo de trabalho e componentes do designer de fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: A workflow designer loader is also responsible for writing changes to an open document back to the storage the loader used when loading the document after the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method is called.
trans-unit.target: Um carregador de designer de fluxo de trabalho também é responsável por gravar alterações para um documento aberto para o armazenamento o carregador usado ao carregar o documento após o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método é chamado.

trans-unit.source: When you inherit from <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" />, you must override the following members: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.FileName" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.ForceReload" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileReader(System.String)" /> and <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileWriter(System.String)" />.
trans-unit.target: Ao herdar de <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" />, você deve substituir os seguintes membros: <see cref="P:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.FileName" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.ForceReload" />, <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileReader(System.String)" /> e <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileWriter(System.String)" />.

trans-unit.source: When implemented in a derived class, initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Quando implementado em uma classe derivada, inicializa uma nova instância da classe <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to create a new instance of a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> object.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como criar uma nova instância de um <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> objeto.

trans-unit.source: In this case, the `WorkflowLoader` class is derived from <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: Nesse caso, o `WorkflowLoader` classe é derivada de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> is created, a <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> is also created and associated with the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> using the `BeginLoad` method.
trans-unit.target: Quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> é criado, um <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface> também é criado e associado a <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> usando o `BeginLoad` método.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> to add.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Activity" /> a ser adicionado.

trans-unit.source: Adds an activity to the designer host after it has been added to the parent activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Adiciona uma atividade no host do designer depois que ele foi adicionado à coleção de atividades pai.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to add a <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> to the designer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como adicionar um <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.CodeActivity> para o designer.

trans-unit.source: Before the activity is added to the designer using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.AddActivityToDesigner%2A> method, it is first added to the Activities collection of the root activity within the workflow.
trans-unit.target: Antes que a atividade é adicionada ao designer usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.AddActivityToDesigner%2A> método, ele é adicionado à coleção de atividades da atividade raiz no fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Releases all resources used by the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" />.
trans-unit.target: Libera todos os recursos usados pelo <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" />.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> releases all services used by the designer host, but it does not write pending changes to the designer loader.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> versões todos os serviços usados pelo host do designer, mas não grava as alterações pendentes para o carregador do designer.

trans-unit.source: If you want to save any pending changes prior to releasing all resources, call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> before you call <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Se você deseja salvar as alterações pendentes antes de liberar todos os recursos, chame <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> antes de chamar <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A>.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates an implementation of the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra uma implementação de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Dispose%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: In this implementation, various services that have been added to the LoaderHost object are removed in preparation for closing the application.
trans-unit.target: Nessa implementação, vários serviços que foram adicionados ao objeto LoaderHost são removidos na preparação para fechar o aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: This example is from the Tracking Profile Designer SDK sample.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo é um exemplo de controle SDK do criador de perfil de.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Tracking Profile Designer Sample](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações, consulte [exemplo criador de perfil do controle](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/a280199c-3000-4148-ac63-cb5aaeac07c8).

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the file name of the designer to load.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém o nome do arquivo do designer a ser carregado.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the file name of the designer to load.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o nome do arquivo do designer para carregar.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.FileName%2A> property to return the path of the currently loaded workflow file used by the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.FileName%2A> propriedade para retornar o caminho do arquivo de fluxo de trabalho atualmente carregado usado pelo <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: Writes pending changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Grava as alterações pendentes no local do qual o designer foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> method to serialize a workflow using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> método para serializar um fluxo de trabalho usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: In this example, the overridden <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> delegates to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method defined in the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> derived class.
trans-unit.target: Neste exemplo, substituído <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Flush%2A> delega para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> método definido no <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader> classe derivada.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, causes <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> to reload the designer.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, faz com que <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> recarregue o designer.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains a path to the file to read from.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém um caminho para o arquivo do qual será feita a leitura.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, retrieves an object that <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> uses to read from the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, recupera um objeto que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> usa para ler o arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> to read the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.TextReader" /> para ler o arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and return a `TextReader` object when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileReader%2A> overloaded method is called.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e retornar um `TextReader` objeto quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileReader%2A> é chamado de método sobrecarregado.

trans-unit.source: A string that contains the path to the file to write to.
trans-unit.target: Uma cadeia de caracteres que contém o caminho para o arquivo no qual será feita a gravação.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets an object that the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> uses to write to the specified file.
trans-unit.target: Quando substituído em uma classe derivada, obtém um objeto que o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> usa para gravar no arquivo especificado.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> to write to the file.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.IO.TextWriter" /> para gravar no arquivo.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to create and return a `TextWriter` object when the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileWriter%2A> overloaded method is called.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como criar e retornar um `TextWriter` objeto quando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.GetFileWriter%2A> é chamado de método sobrecarregado.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the workflow should be loaded in debug mode.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o fluxo de trabalho deve ser carregado no modo de depuração.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the workflow should be loaded in debug mode; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> Se o fluxo de trabalho deve ser carregado no modo de depuração; Caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The default is <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: O padrão é <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The following method determines whether the workflow designer is locked by the debugger if the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.InDebugMode%2A> property of the current `WorkflowDesignerLoader` returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: O método a seguir determina se o designer de fluxo de trabalho está bloqueado pelo depurador, se o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.InDebugMode%2A> propriedade `WorkflowDesignerLoader` retorna `true`.

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> with any services required by the designer loader host.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa o <see cref="T:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader" /> com todos os serviços necessários para o host do carregador de designer.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> method in a derived class to add the services needed for the designer.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.Initialize%2A> método em uma classe derivada para adicionar os serviços necessários para o designer.

trans-unit.source: The services can vary based on the level of service support required by your application.
trans-unit.target: Os serviços podem variar com base no nível de suporte de serviço exigido pelo seu aplicativo.

trans-unit.source: An <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> that is created for the serialized layout.
trans-unit.target: Um <see cref="T:System.Xml.XmlReader" /> que é criado para o layout serializado.

trans-unit.source: List of errors that occurred during the deserialization.
trans-unit.target: Lista de erros que ocorreram durante a desserialização.

trans-unit.source: Applies the serialized layout to the root designer in the current designer host.
trans-unit.target: Aplica o layout serializado no designer raiz no host do designer atual.

trans-unit.source: This example shows how to load the layout for a specific workflow definition using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Este exemplo mostra como carregar o layout de uma definição de fluxo de trabalho específico usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is created using the file name of a designer layout file that was created using <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.SaveDesignerLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Um <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> objeto é criado usando o nome do arquivo de um arquivo de layout do designer que foi criado usando <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.SaveDesignerLayout%2A>.

trans-unit.source: When the layout has finished loading, any errors that might have occurred are displayed to the user.
trans-unit.target: Quando o layout terminou o carregamento, os erros que possam ter ocorrido são exibidos ao usuário.

trans-unit.source: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> that the resource is associated with.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Type" /> ao qual o recurso está associado.

trans-unit.source: Name of the resource.
trans-unit.target: Nome do recurso.

trans-unit.source: Errors encountered during the call to <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Collections.IList@)" />.
trans-unit.target: Erros encontrados durante a chamada para <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Collections.IList@)" />.

trans-unit.source: Retrieves the specified resource and calls the <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Collections.IList@)" /> method that applies the serialized layout to the root designer in the current designer host.
trans-unit.target: Recupera o recurso especificado e chama o método <see cref="M:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout(System.Xml.XmlReader,System.Collections.IList@)" /> que aplica o layout serializado ao designer raiz no host do designer atual.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if load operation is successful; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se a operação de carregamento for bem-sucedida, caso contrário, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: Contains the load errors.
trans-unit.target: Contém os erros de carregamento.

trans-unit.source: Called when loading of the designer is completed.
trans-unit.target: Chamado quando o carregamento do designer é concluído.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> method to display errors that might have occurred during the loading of a workflow.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.OnEndLoad%2A> método para exibir os erros que possam ter ocorrido durante o carregamento de um fluxo de trabalho.

trans-unit.source: Class that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> interface, which manages design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: Classe que implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />, que gerencia a serialização do tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Writes cached changes to the location that the designer was loaded from.
trans-unit.target: Grava as alterações em cache no local do qual o designer foi carregado.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to override the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> method to serialize the workflow using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir demonstra como substituir o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.PerformFlush%2A> método para serializar o fluxo de trabalho usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Serialization.WorkflowMarkupSerializer>.

trans-unit.source: Class that implements the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" /> interface, which manages design-time serialization.
trans-unit.target: Classe que implementa a interface <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.IDesignerSerializationManager" />, que gerencia a serialização do tempo de design.

trans-unit.source: Loads the designer from a design document.
trans-unit.target: Carrega o designer de um documento de design.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to override the `PerformLoad` method to deserialize a workflow and load it in the designer using the `AddObjectGraphToDesignerHost` helper method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como substituir o `PerformLoad` método para desserializar um fluxo de trabalho e carregá-lo no designer usando o `AddObjectGraphToDesignerHost` método auxiliar.

trans-unit.source: Activity to be removed from the designer.
trans-unit.target: Atividade a ser removida do designer.

trans-unit.source: Removes an activity from the designer host after it has been added to the parent activities collection.
trans-unit.target: Remove uma atividade do host do designer depois que ela foi adicionada à coleção de atividades pai.

trans-unit.source: The following example shows how to remove an activity from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como remover uma atividade a partir de <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>.

trans-unit.source: Before the last child activity in the workflow is removed from the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>, it is first removed from the workflow <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities%2A> collection.
trans-unit.target: Antes que a última atividade filho no fluxo de trabalho é removida o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader>, primeiro, ele é removido do fluxo de trabalho <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.CompositeActivity.Activities%2A> coleção.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="XmlWriter" /> that is used to serialize the layout into.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="XmlWriter" /> que é usado para serializar o layout.

trans-unit.source: Root activity from which you get the layout information.
trans-unit.target: Atividade raiz de onde você obtém as informações de layout.

trans-unit.source: Errors encountered during serialization.
trans-unit.target: Erros encontrados durante a serialização.

trans-unit.source: Serializes the designer layout.
trans-unit.target: Serializa o layout do designer.

trans-unit.source: The following example demonstrates how to save the design layout information of a workflow using the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.SaveDesignerLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: O exemplo a seguir mostra como salvar as informações de layout de design de um fluxo de trabalho usando o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.SaveDesignerLayout%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is created, the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> for the `RootComponent` of the workflow is retrieved and passed to the <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.SaveDesignerLayout%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Após o <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> objeto é criado, o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.ActivityDesigner> para o `RootComponent` do fluxo de trabalho é recuperado e passado para o <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.SaveDesignerLayout%2A> método.

trans-unit.source: To load the layout file that is generated by this method, see <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout%2A>.
trans-unit.target: Para carregar o arquivo de layout que é gerado por esse método, consulte <xref:System.Workflow.ComponentModel.Design.WorkflowDesignerLoader.LoadDesignerLayout%2A>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> metadata of the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: Obtém os metadados <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> do [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)] de destino.

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> metadata of the target [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
trans-unit.target: O <see cref="T:System.ComponentModel.TypeDescriptor" /> metadados do destino [!INCLUDE[dnprdnshort](~/includes/dnprdnshort-md.md)].
